about_the_game:
1. A tournament experience

Table Tennis ReCrafted! 2025 simulates a tournament-level gameplay.

Although it can be played by everyone, it favours those who are trained in table tennis.

2. Practice Mode

Pass 9 practice levels (30 seconds each) and test your skills in forehand top-spins, backhand top-spins and blocks!

Practise with multi-ball training in these modes:

a. Forehand-backhand swing

b. Forehand-middle-backhand

c. Step-around forehand

d. Random

e. others

3. Face off tough simulated A.I.

Play against 12 simulated world champions. Top spin rallies, side-spins, drop-shots, pendulum services, reverse-pendulum services, banana flick...

4. Play with 3 different controls

Three controls are available. Auto mode for the casual player. Semi-auto for one who wants more control. Manual for professional table tennis players and coaches.

5. Challenge yourself to maximum hit counts

Ping Pong Ping Pong Ping Pong Ping Pong,.. So fast! x'D

6. Unstoppable rallies

Long rallies just like you would see on TV. Have fun~

reviews:
“Plz+ REAL ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODE🙏 PingPongPingPong.! Is how ultra fast the AI's returns are being sent back at the real players, and so, I expect to be practicing alot before beating the Legendary Sim Champs in the Trials mode! It's fast, it seems unrealistic, but professional, Olympic level Ping-Pong players are really that fast! Thankz for the level of challenging you've imbued into the gameplay's metrics! On 2nd thought, the returned shots sound more like: pingPingpingPing..! Nice job Dev! (2021)”
4.8/5.0 – Google Play

“Physics are awesome! The physics in this game are truly impressive. I really felt like I could control the direction of the ball. I think that the paddle implementation was great, too. I didn’t feel that using my fingers hurt the experience at all. With that being said, I wish the AI had more personalization to them, such as specialized paddles or something unique to each of the opponents! Keep up the good work! (2023)”
4.8/5.0 – Apple Store
